gloss: deśita-śikṣaiva deśita-śikṣā an-aṅgopetāye | deśita-śikṣā tañ ca se karma kurvanti | jñapti-sampannaṁ gaṇa-sampannaṁ anu-śrāvaṇā-sampannaṁ anyatarānyatareṇa karmopakleśena an-upakliṣṭaṁ | evam eṣā deśita-śikṣā |
aṣṭādaśahi varttehi dve varṣāṇi aśikṣita-śikṣā | katamehi aṣṭādaśahi sarva-bhikṣuṇīnāṁ navikety ādi pūrvavat yathā gu <span class='supplied'>ru
